anya-e1215n:23: Savaṇā lapanā ceva satiyā cāpi vandanā,
anya-e1215n:29: Yo lokatilako nātho pūretvā dasa pāramī,
anya-e1215n:32: Ārādhito surādīhi kālo mārisa te ayaṃ,
anya-e1215n:35: Etadatthāya te vīra pūritā dasa pāramī,
anya-e1215n:36: Bāhuṃ pitussa putto’va loko ālambate tuvaṃ;
anya-e1215n:38: Tesaṃ taṃ vacanaṃ sutvā mahāsatto mahāmatī,
anya-e1215n:50: Janānaṃ nīlanettehi vadanehi tu yā purī,
anya-e1215n:98: Nivedetvā tamatthaṃ sā rañño tena susajjite,
anya-e1215n:113: Brahmāno lokapālā ca manussā kamato tadā,
anya-e1215n:116: Mahiṃ patiṭṭhito dhīro passitvāna tato disā,
anya-e1215n:128: Dibbehi rūpasaddehi gandhehi ca rasehi ca,
anya-e1215n:135: Dassetvā’sesasippaṃ taṃ loke vijjati yaṃ tadā;
anya-e1215n:137: Ñātisaṅghaṃ pamodento deve ca manuje’pi ca,
anya-e1215n:165: Sasī’va dassanīyo ca sūriyo viya tejavā;
anya-e1215n:201: Vajjanti bheriyo tāsu paggayha kāci nāriyo;
anya-e1215n:204: Dhamanti susiraṃ kāci kāci vādenti tantiyo;
anya-e1215n:212: Disvāna so tamacchariyaṃ viratto visaye tadā,
anya-e1215n:219: Iccevaṃ cintayanto so supantova sayī tahiṃ;
anya-e1215n:222: So’yaṃ’dāni supī’ amhe kassadāni karoma taṃ?;
anya-e1215n:224: Iti cintiya te tattha turiyesu sake sake,
anya-e1215n:227: Khādanti kāci dantāni kāci lālā vahantiyo,
anya-e1215n:230: Kākacchanti’pi semhampi gilanti ca camanti ca,
anya-e1215n:231: Karonti nādaṃ nāsāya gharū’ti ca khipanti ca;
anya-e1215n:233: Muttayanti tadā kāci rahassaṃ vicaranti ca,
anya-e1215n:234: Duggandhaṃ vāti taṃ ṭhānaṃ susānaṃ āmakaṃ yathā;
anya-e1215n:237: Addakkhi tāsaṃ nekāni vikārāni tahiṃ tadā;
anya-e1215n:252: Buddho hutvāpi’maṃ sakkā passituṃ iti cintiya;
anya-e1215n:254: Gato nātho tato ṭhānā bodhiyā baddhamānaso
anya-e1215n:255: Tadahevāsi buddhoti kāmuko ko na cintaye;
anya-e1215n:279: Pasatto tattha turago dukkhato agamī tadā;
anya-e1215n:284: Tīraṭṭho passi so dhīro gaṅgānāriṃ rasāvahaṃ,
anya-e1215n:290: Pabbajituṃ mayettheva yuttaṃ no me papañcituṃ,
anya-e1215n:297: Tiṭṭhatu gagane gantvā iti ukkhipi ca’mbaraṃ;
anya-e1215n:302: Kāretvā maṇithūpaṃ so nīdhetvā taṃ siroruhaṃ,
anya-e1215n:308: Pubbe viyambaraṃ gayha ambare khipi nāyako,
anya-e1215n:309: Paṭiggahetvā taṃ brahmā netvā brahmapuraṃ caraṃ;
anya-e1215n:317: Tato ambavanaṃ gantvā vindanto pītijaṃ sukhaṃ,
anya-e1215n:327: Disvā evaṃ vicintesuṃ nāyaṃ yo so janādhipo;
anya-e1215n:332: Sutvāna taṃ tadā keci hasantā vacanantaraṃ,
anya-e1215n:333: Nāyaṃ sasī sasaṅekā so bhānumeso’ti no mati;
anya-e1215n:338: Kiṃ bho ummattakā attha evaṃ mā vadathā’dhunā,
anya-e1215n:339: Sataraṃsī uṇharaṃsī na so eso aviggaho;
anya-e1215n:342: Sarūpena na no atthi saṃsayo balu mānase;
anya-e1215n:344: Tesaṃ taṃ vacanaṃ sutvā hasantā keci jantuno,
anya-e1215n:345: Tumhe khalū na jānātha sabāṇe sadhanū hi so;
anya-e1215n:348: Kelāso iti sampatto jahātha vimatiṃ idha;
anya-e1215n:350: Tesampi vacanaṃ sutvā hasanteke janā tadā,
anya-e1215n:351: Nāyaṃ haro tinetto so kesaveso idhāgato;
anya-e1215n:354: Vesenaññena maññāma ettha no natthi saṃsayo;
anya-e1215n:356: Paharitvā karaṃ keci sutvā taṃ vacanaṃ narā,
anya-e1215n:357: Hasantevaṃ tadāvocuṃ vāsudevo na ve ayaṃ;
anya-e1215n:363: Passitunti paṭiññāto mā bhonto vilapantu ve;
anya-e1215n:365: Sutvā tesaṃ giraṃ keci keḷiṃ katvāna nekadhā,
anya-e1215n:366: Tumhe sakkaṃ na jānātha so hi bho vajirāyudho;
anya-e1215n:368: Eso hi bho mahābrahmā brahmalokā idhāgato,
anya-e1215n:369: Pamattā kinnu vedamhī brahmabandhu pure idha;
anya-e1215n:372: Nete candādayo kāmaṃ mā mohaṃ bho pakāsatha;
anya-e1215n:380: Evaṃ vadantā sabbe te nāgarā purisuttamaṃ,
anya-e1215n:384: Jantavo mananāvāyo pāraṃ passiṃsu no tadā;
anya-e1215n:395: Amataṃ viya taṃ bhutvā vikkhāletvā mukhaṃ dakā,
anya-e1215n:396: Patte vattaṃ caritvāna muhuttaṃ tattha vissami;
anya-e1215n:408: Pakāsetvāna lokassa mokkhaṃ natthiti tena so;
anya-e1215n:416: Tadā senāni nigame sujātā khīra dāyikā,
anya-e1215n:422: Yathā mayhaṃ mahādeva iddhā patthita patthanā,
anya-e1215n:425: Iti vatvāna vanditvā katvā ca naṃ padakkhiṇaṃ,
anya-e1215n:435: Disvāna supine pañca atthaṃ tesaṃ vicintiya;
anya-e1215n:447: Tato mahiṃ dvidhā katvā samuṭṭhāsi mahāsanaṃ;
anya-e1215n:452: Kāmaṃ taco nahārū ca aṭṭhi ca avasissatu,
anya-e1215n:455: Na uṭṭhahāmabujjhitvā na jahe vīriyaṃ mama,
anya-e1215n:516: Nāgatā neva vāhesuṃ sabbe etthe’va osaṭā;
anya-e1215n:519: Nāgādayo na dhutāsuṃ ketunaṃ bahu kā kathā;
anya-e1215n:522: Tārakā gagane brūmo kinnu tattha dhajālutā;
anya-e1215n:540: Nosīnā dharaṇī bhārā disebhānaṃ balaṃ aho;
anya-e1215n:560: Kañcanādāsahatthā ca kācī kaññā tathā ṭhitā,
anya-e1215n:563: Kāci maṅgala saṃyutta vacanā tava patthanā,
anya-e1215n:569: Naccanti keci kīḷanti selenti ca lalanti ca,
anya-e1215n:570: Vādenti keci gāyanti velukkhepaṃ karonti ca;
anya-e1215n:594: Pūjāvisesaṃ taṃ ko hi mukhenekena bhāsatī;
anya-e1215n:597: Dasakaṇṭho’pi taṃ sabbaṃ neva sakkonti bhāsituṃ;
anya-e1215n:602: Tasmintu vāsare māro passitvā bhuvanaṃ idaṃ,
anya-e1215n:605: Sabbe dibbavimānā bho suññā dissanti chaḍḍitā,
anya-e1215n:608: Kimbho māra na jānāsi matto sutto’si ajja kiṃ,
anya-e1215n:612: Bodhimule nisinno si ajja buddho bhavāmīti;
anya-e1215n:617: Kinnu te badhiraṃ sotaṃ kinnu parihāyi locanaṃ,
anya-e1215n:618: Dhajaggā te na dissanti ullolaṃ te na sūyati;
anya-e1215n:620: Tesaṃ taṃ vacanaṃ sutvā antako khalu pāpimā,
anya-e1215n:624: Asāro khalu saṃsāro siddhatthe vibhavaṃ gate;
anya-e1215n:629: Nirālokaṃ tilokaṃ bho asuraṃ vāsaraṃ yathā,
anya-e1215n:638: Māpetha bheravaṃ vaṇṇaṃ bībhacchaṃ duddasaṃ kharaṃ,
anya-e1215n:641: Tassa taṃ vacanaṃ sutvā mārasenā samāgamuṃ,
anya-e1215n:647: Disvāna durato ettaṃ devā māraṃ savāhiniṃ,
anya-e1215n:650: Saṃkhippa khippaṃ sacchattaṃ brahmā dhāvi parammukho,
anya-e1215n:651: Katvāna piṭṭhiyaṃ saṅkhaṃ sakko dhāvi visaṅkito;
anya-e1215n:669: Andhakāraṃ disā āsuṃ dhūmaketu ca ambare;
anya-e1215n:684: Na yuttañhi gajo yāti gajaṃ no yāti kotthukaṃ;
anya-e1215n:686: Netaṃ garu palāpetuṃ kālo iti vicintiya,
anya-e1215n:708: Cāletuṃ neva so sakkhi aṃsumattampi cīvare;
anya-e1215n:714: Niccaṃ vandatha pūjetha so hi vo saraṇaṃ sadā;
anya-e1215n:720: Hotu dāni mahoghena pavāhemi imaṃ yatiṃ,
anya-e1215n:736: Mahābhīma nabho bherissanā āsuṃ tahiṃ tahiṃ;
anya-e1215n:751: Niccaṃ vandatha pūjetha so hi vo saraṇaṃ sadā;
anya-e1215n:757: Bhavatajja kimetena māraṇe tassa kiṃ garu,
anya-e1215n:760: Iti cintiya so māro māpetvāṅgāra vuṭṭhiyo,
anya-e1215n:782: Niccaṃ vandatha pūjetha so hi vo saraṇaṃ sadā;
anya-e1215n:786: Dukkhito dummano hutvā evaṃ cintesi dummati;
anya-e1215n:804: Niccaṃ vandatha pūjetha so hi vo saraṇaṃ sadā;
anya-e1215n:820: Niccaṃ vandatha pūjetha so hi vo saraṇaṃ sadā;
anya-e1215n:823: Taṃ disvā pāpimā kuddho yaṃ yaṃ tassa karoma’haṃ,
anya-e1215n:824: Taṃ taṃ’dānī na sakkoti kiñci kākumu’pakkamaṃ;
anya-e1215n:836: Niccaṃ vandatha pūjetha so hi vo saraṇaṃ sadā;
anya-e1215n:839: Tato disvāna taṃ kaṇho kaṇhasenā purakkhato,
anya-e1215n:840: Saṅkuddho pesayi tattha vassaṃ so sikatāmayaṃ;
anya-e1215n:849: Niccaṃ vandatha pūjetha so hi vo saraṇaṃ sadā;
anya-e1215n:855: Iti cintiya māpetvā pesesi palipaṃ ghanaṃ,
anya-e1215n:856: Dhūpāyanto pajjalanto gantvā so nabhasā lahuṃ;
anya-e1215n:865: Niccaṃ vandatha pūjetha so hi vo saraṇaṃ sadā;
anya-e1215n:871: Mayhaṃ bhāroti cintetvā māpesi timiraṃ ghanaṃ;
anya-e1215n:874: Gantvāna gaganā so hi patvāna munisantikaṃ;
anya-e1215n:883: Niccaṃ vandatha pūjetha so hi vo saraṇaṃ sadā;
anya-e1215n:886: Evaṃ navahi vuṭṭhihi katvā māro mahā bhavaṃ,
anya-e1215n:895: Tatheva so mahiṃ kuddho māro khipati vegavā,
anya-e1215n:898: Tatheva kupito tena khipate so mahambudhiṃ,
anya-e1215n:899: Vilayaṃ jalajā yanti sussate so mahaṇṇavo;
anya-e1215n:908: Niccaṃ vandatha pūjetha so hi vo saraṇaṃ sadā;
anya-e1215n:911: Iti kopagginā dittamanaṃ māraṃ tadā jino,
anya-e1215n:914: Evaṃ katvāpi so kuddho aladdhavijayo tadā,
anya-e1215n:923: Athagā saha vācāhi bhiṃsā sā māravāhinī,
anya-e1215n:942: Bhujaṅge ca guṇe keci gāḷhamākaḍḍhayanti ca;
anya-e1215n:957: Gattena rakkhasā hutvā keci dhāvanti kiṅakarā;
anya-e1215n:971: Gilantā keci phaṇino uggirantā tatheva ca,
anya-e1215n:972: Sīsa kandhara kaṇṇanta bāhu aṅguli ādisu;
anya-e1215n:981: Lālayantā sakā jivhā khandhe katvāna muggare,
anya-e1215n:993: Yaṃ diṭṭha suta mattena maraṇaṃ citta vibbhamaṃ,
anya-e1215n:994: Yāti loko kathaṃ ko taṃ nissesaṃ bhāsate naro;
anya-e1215n:1011: Sahassabāhuṃ māpetvā chūrikā yaṭṭhi satti ca,
anya-e1215n:1021: Āvahanto bhayaṃ brahma sura siddhādīnaṃ tadā,
anya-e1215n:1030: Akampo so munī evamagge’kāsi nijaṃ balaṃ,
anya-e1215n:1049: Suṇātha bho giraṃ mayhaṃ bhavatajja mahā bhavo;
anya-e1215n:1051: Etha yātha samaggattha na ossakkatha sujjhatha,
anya-e1215n:1054: Ajja gacchati niṭṭhānaṃ so bho pāramitābhaṭā,
anya-e1215n:1057: Atha dānabhaṭo āha apphoṭaṃ diguṇaṃ bhujaṃ,
anya-e1215n:1061: Ubho passe karitvāna saseno dhāvi dappavā;
anya-e1215n:1073: Sosemi mama tejena vadaṃ’gā māra sāgaraṃ;
anya-e1215n:1082: Nisidi tassa tejena nirussāhāsi sā camū;
anya-e1215n:1084: Aho bho vimhayaṃ dāni suṇātha munino mama,
anya-e1215n:1088: Aduṭṭho jeti sambuddho ānubhāvo hi tādiso;
anya-e1215n:1091: Nirāyudho’va taṃ jeti ānubhāvo hi tādiso;
anya-e1215n:1094: Niccalo jeti sambuddho ānubhāvo hi tādiso;
anya-e1215n:1097: Nisinnova jino jeti ānubhāvo hi tādiso;
anya-e1215n:1100: Nissaddo jeti sambuddho ānubhāvo hi tādiso;
anya-e1215n:1106: Khippaṃ siddhattha he gaccha santakedaṃ mamāsanaṃ;
anya-e1215n:1108: No ce gacchasi te hadayaṃ phālemi nakhasattihi,
anya-e1215n:1111: Passa me mahatiṃ senaṃ passa āyudhasañcayaṃ,
anya-e1215n:1112: Tena taṃ abhimaddāmi tuvaṭaṃ gacchidaṃ mama;
anya-e1215n:1115: Kadā te pūritā māra pallaṅkatthāya pāramī;
anya-e1215n:1117: Kadā adāsi sīsādī dānaṃ sīlaṃ kathaṃ tava,
anya-e1215n:1120: Athā’ha pharuso māro netaṃ garu mune mama,
anya-e1215n:1121: Ayaṃ sā parisā sabbā tassa paccakkhakārakaṃ;
anya-e1215n:1126: Athāha māro samaṇa ahaṃ sakkhi kathāpayiṃ,
anya-e1215n:1127: Tava ko sakkhi yajjatthi kathāpehi lahuṃ mama;
anya-e1215n:1129: Athāha bhagavā tassa gambhīraṃ madhuraṃ giraṃ,
anya-e1215n:1132: Taveva me na santīdha paccakkhatthaṃ sacetanā,
anya-e1215n:1135: Iti vatvāna mārāri sañtdhā jimūta gabbhato,
anya-e1215n:1162: Aṅguliyo mukhe keci pakkhipanti rudanti ca,
anya-e1215n:1163: Keci vandanti yāvanti abhayaṃ sāmi dehi no;
anya-e1215n:1171: Taṅkaṇe uggato āsi satthu kitti jayaddhajo,
anya-e1215n:1178: Niccaṃ vandatha pūjetha so hi vo saraṇaṃ sadā;
anya-e1215n:1184: Devā te nikhilā netvā nānāpūjāvidhiṃ tato,
anya-e1215n:1194: Dhamentā viya saṅkhāni kūjenti madhuraṃ giraṃ;
anya-e1215n:1212: Āsavānaṃ khaye ñāṇā laddhā aggaphalaṃ tadā;
anya-e1215n:1220: Gahakāraka diṭṭhosi puna gehaṃ na kāhasi,
anya-e1215n:1221: Sabbā te phāsukā bhaggā gahakūṭaṃ visaṅkhitaṃ,
anya-e1215n:1232: Pāpārayo ca vijito sa dadātu santiṃ;
anya-e1215n:1349: Hā tāta hā tāta kimāsi tedaṃ
anya-e1215n:1350: Naṭṭhannu te kiṃ vada patthasī kiṃ,
anya-e1215n:1526: Giriṃ nakhena khaṇatha ayo dantehi khādatha;
anya-e1215n:1823: Tvaṃ ko’si re! Iti paro aparaṃ kharena
anya-e1215n:1842: Muḷhā disañca vidisaṃ na vidiṃsu bhītā,
anya-e1215n:1874: Ogamma tattha puthu patthari camma kaṇḍaṃ;
anya-e1215n:1893: Tasmimpi te pavisituṃ saraṇaṃ na laddhā
anya-e1215n:1919: Lokagga puggala varaṃ dada sāmi dhīsa;
anya-e1215n:1923: Tumhe vinā khaṇalavaṃ vasituṃ na icche
anya-e1215n:1933: Katvā’tha so vara mahaṃ tidivehi saddhi
anya-e1215n:1974: Magge phale ca saraṇe ca patiṭṭhahiṃsu
anya-e1215n:2014: Atha ca duhituyā so dīyamānaṃ dadanto
anya-e1215n:2050: Sumana sumana nāmaṃ passi devaṃ samiddhiṃ;
anya-e1215n:2105: Thuti mukhara mukhā tā sādhu kīḷaṃ akaṃsu;
anya-e1215n:2107: Atha muni uragānaṃ viggahaṃ taṃ sametuṃ
anya-e1215n:2112: Na bho bho saṃsāre khalu bhavati sāraṃ lavampi
anya-e1215n:2113: Visesā taṃ sītaṃ jalita dahane vijjati kadā,
anya-e1215n:2114: Sadā rāgaṃ rogaṃ byadhati janataṃ nekaduritaṃ
anya-e1215n:2117: Sarīro’yaṃ battiṃsa vidha kuṇapo sāra rahito
anya-e1215n:2120: Athevaṃ sante bho varayati bhavaṃ ko nu hi budho;
anya-e1215n:2124: Phaṇī majjāro sā guhaka kapayo bhūya bahuso
anya-e1215n:2127: Pure kāko’lukā atha vanabhavā phandana isā
anya-e1215n:2132: Balaṃ bālānaṃ bho saka saka vadhāyeva bhavati
anya-e1215n:2134: Gajaṃ bālaṃ mattaṃ pavidhi na balaṃ hoti saraṇaṃ
anya-e1215n:2135: Athaṭṭhāne kiṃ bho kurutha vīriyaṃ bhuti hananaṃ;
anya-e1215n:2137: Na dukkhaṃ tesaṃ ye vigata kalahā ekamanasā
anya-e1215n:2138: Atīte bho lāpā aghaṭita mānā peyyavacanā,
anya-e1215n:2139: Sukhaṃ vāsaṃ’kāsuṃ yadahani bhavuṃ te’tha vidhurā
anya-e1215n:2144: Atha muditamanā te pīṇitā tassa nāgā
anya-e1215n:2148: Taruṇa raviva tasmiṃ āsane āsi bhāsaṃ,
anya-e1215n:2162: Yadi sugata! Imaṃ tvaṃ nāgato assa ṭhānaṃ
anya-e1215n:2165: Pasami dahana dittaṃ ambudeneva taṃ tvaṃ;
anya-e1215n:2173: Yadi manasi dayā te hoti dāse punā’pi,
anya-e1215n:2180: Sa sumana taru rājaṃ pūjanatthaṃ vidhāya;
anya-e1215n:2185: Dadati iti ca vatvā ovaditvāna satthā;
anya-e1215n:2293: Yo neka kappa sata sañcita puññarāsi
anya-e1215n:2296: Ko tattha bhuti matulaṃ kathiko katheti;
anya-e1215n:2315: Ñatvā taṃ sumano nāgo lahumāgamma sīhalaṃ,
anya-e1215n:2321: Datvā tulādayo sesa mandiraṅge tatheva ca,
anya-e1215n:2328: Soṇṇa kiṅkiṇi mālāyo kaṇṇamālā ca māpiya;
anya-e1215n:2351: Sañcinitvāna te nāgā khajja bhojja phalāphale,
anya-e1215n:2354: Tato kāruṇiko nātho bodhito aṭṭhame same,
anya-e1215n:2387: Sāsanodaya selagge sūriyo viya bhāti yo,
anya-e1215n:2391: Pākaṭo bhuvane so’pi gato sambuddha santikaṃ;
anya-e1215n:2441: Tato sambuddha dehasmā nikkhantāsuṃ cha raṃsiyo,
anya-e1215n:2466: Uggantvā parato yantī nīra nijjhara sannībhā;
anya-e1215n:2469: Kārayantā sakaṃ vaṇṇaṃ dhāvantā’pi ca sindhavo;
anya-e1215n:2490: Yāti kiṃ buhmalokannu amhākaṃ bhavanannu kho;
anya-e1215n:2499: Yāvamānā jinaṃ keci tiṭṭhanti ca mahanti ca;
anya-e1215n:2513: Yesaṃ yesaṃ manasmiṃ yaṃ yamatthi kiñci saṃsayaṃ,
anya-e1215n:2514: Tesaṃ taṃ taṃ paṇudento desanāya sudhāsinaṃ;
anya-e1215n:2520: Paṭimaggaṃ karontā te tattha tattha mahāmahaṃ;
anya-e1215n:2525: Ye passanti jinaṃ tattha sasissaṃ siriyā jalaṃ,
anya-e1215n:2528: Ye suṇanti tadā dhammaṃ dhammissara pabhāvitaṃ,
anya-e1215n:2529: Suladdhā tehi sotāni tesaṃ sotāni sotakā;
anya-e1215n:2532: Suladdhā tehi ve jivhā tesaṃ jivhā rasaññakā
anya-e1215n:2534: Ye vandanti jinaṃ yantaṃ sasaṅghaṃ gaganaṅgane,
anya-e1215n:2535: Suladdhā tehi hatthāni tesaṃyeva bhujā bhujā;
anya-e1215n:2537: Tadā tathāgataṃ disvā ye santuṭṭhā tathāgataṃ,
anya-e1215n:2538: Tathāgatānaṃ sabbesaṃ yo toso hotu sabbadā;
anya-e1215n:2543: Tato gaṅgā manuññañhi sampattaṃ taṃ saputtakaṃ,
anya-e1215n:2549: Tato so yācito satthā nāgasaṅghehi vandiya,
anya-e1215n:2555: Tato bhikkhu nisīdiṃsu patta pattāsane tadā,
anya-e1215n:2562: Nettinda maṇināvāhi pāraṃ gantuṃ na te pabhu;
anya-e1215n:2564: Tato sasaṅghaṃ sugataṃ sajano maṇi akkhiko,
anya-e1215n:2578: Maggā janā khalu labhanti kadā patiṭṭhaṃ,
anya-e1215n:2583: Jātī jarā maraṇa dukkha pariddavā ca
anya-e1215n:2594: Rūpe na rajjatha tato khalu sādhupaññā;
anya-e1215n:2636: Evaṃ saddhammamaggaṃ varamati sugato desayi pannagānaṃ
anya-e1215n:2637: Sutvā te sampahaṭṭhā mahamahamakaruṃ nijjarādīhi saddhiṃ,
anya-e1215n:2638: Tesaṃ ve desanāyaṃ suraviṭapi samā sātthikā tattha jātā
anya-e1215n:2639: So nātho tañca dhammaṃ bhagavati tanayā te ca vo pālayantu
anya-e1215n:2719: Madhuka vaṭa kareri bodhi jambīra bhalli
anya-e1215n:2757: Siddhā ca siddhavanitā hi tahiṃ tahiṃ te
anya-e1215n:2763: Gokaṇṇa salla sasa jambuka sūkarā ca,
anya-e1215n:2773: Cakkavha kīra kurarā kulalā ca kaṅkā,
anya-e1215n:2789: Kāsātha sopi muni tassa vacaṃ paṭicca
anya-e1215n:2802: Gacchante gaganāyanena sugate bhānu’si santo tadā
anya-e1215n:2803: Vāresuṃ sūriyātapañca jaladā siñjiṃsu bhumyā jalaṃ,
anya-e1215n:2804: Mandāmanda sugandha muddha pavano pāpeti sitaṃ sukhaṃ,
anya-e1215n:2805: Devādi dhaja chatta cāmarakarā pūjenti mānenti ca;
anya-e1215n:3032: Evaṃ so dhammarājā janahitavihito vīta dosārivaggo
anya-e1215n:3034: Taṃ vo saggā’pavaggaṃ dadati munisamaṃ citta matte pasanne
anya-e1215n:3035: Tasmā bho!Bho! Pahaṭṭhā namatha mahatha taṃ sādhu sādhuppasatthaṃ;
anya-e1215n:3040: Tatheva sādhū saṅakappā khippaṃ pappontu pāṇinaṃ;
anya-e1215n:3051: Tassa sisso’si yo vippagāma vaṃseka ketuko
